title: 2 issues with my new account.
body: I am starting up my second account, and want to play mid on it. I  want to gift yasuo to it but It won't let me. I also for some reason, can't quick cast spells.

replies.body:
You'll need to add your other account as a friend, and it will still need to meet the requirement per the [gifting center guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).  The unresponsive spells might be a config issue failing to read your input.  A config reset should fix that up.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if you have any questions!
